table_summary: This table contains hourly data on ecommerce orders, revenue, and costs, along with weather conditions, website sessions, and lagged data for various time periods. It includes data such as total orders, gross revenue, cost of goods sold, orders by marketplace, website, and B2B, weather conditions, whether it's a weekend, day of the week, total sessions, product margin, average order value, conversion rate, revenue per session, and lagged data for previous days.
